definition: to hit the market (of a new product)/to float (a company on the stock market)
Beijing/capital of People's Republic of China/one of the four municipalities 直轄市|直辖市[zhi2 xia2 shi4]
Guangzhou subprovincial city and capital of Guangdong/Canton
Shanghai municipality in southeast China, abbr. 滬|沪

sentences.english: Mr Charles was elected (the) chairman of the municipal education committee.
sentences.chinese: 查尔斯当选为先生市教育委员会主任委员。

sentences.english: It is a little boy from Tampa, Florida – Cody.
sentences.chinese: 他是来自佛罗里达州坦帕市的小男孩科迪。

sentences.english: The small port has developed into a big city.
sentences.chinese: 该小港市已发展成为一个大城市。

sentences.english: Take in the breathtaking scenery around Queenstown before flying home from Christchurch.
sentences.chinese: 享受了昆斯敦市的绝佳美景后再由基督城乘飞机回家。

sentences.english: He has a comfortable apartment in a high-rise building in the business center of the city.
sentences.chinese: 他在市商业中心一幢高层建筑里有一套舒适的公寓。

sentences.english: Under the general circumstance, people of clear water town hardly get to S City.
sentences.chinese: 一般情况下，清水镇的人们很少到S市的。

sentences.english: Ultimately, it is good for healthy and orderly development of Bayannur's small towns.
sentences.chinese: 最终促进巴彦淖尔市小城镇健康有序的发展。

sentences.english: They have established a Chinese church near University of Kansas, Lawrence.
sentences.chinese: 并在堪萨士罗伦斯市建立一所中国人的教会。

sentences.english: Yesterday, the City Federation of Trade Unions held in sympathy with the Urban Management Committee of the sanitation workers activities.
sentences.chinese: 昨日，市总工会与市城管委举行慰问环卫工人活动。

sentences.english: The bus was traveling from Monterrey, Mexico to Houston.
sentences.chinese: 这辆巴士但是正从墨西哥蒙特雷市驶往美国休斯顿。

sentences.english: Throughout its over four hundred years of existence, Quebec City has served as a capital.
sentences.chinese: 魁北克市在整个四百多年的历史中曾作为首府。

sentences.english: City of CDC TB Division Chen Xiubing doctor said.
sentences.chinese: 市疾控中心结核病防治科陈秀兵医师说。

sentences.english: The main draw in agra is of course the taj mahal.
sentences.chinese: 印度阿格拉市主要的名胜当然是泰姬陵了。

sentences.english: The next World Choir Games will be held in Cincinnati.
sentences.chinese: 下一届世界合唱节将在美国辛辛那提市举行。

sentences.english: Is it great?Now the world's biggest pencil is in a city museum in the USA.
sentences.chinese: 现在这枝世界最大的铅笔在美国的一家市博物馆里。

sentences.english: Chiba Prefecture, Japan ABIKO a city, not far from Tokyo.
sentences.chinese: ABIKO是日本千叶县的一个市，离东京不远。

definition: to save/to economize/to do without/to omit/to leave out/province/(archaic) central government department
to inspect/to examine/to be aware/to pay a visit (to one's parents or elders)
autonomous region, namely: Inner Mongolia 內蒙古自治區|内蒙古自治区, Guangxi 廣西壯族自治區|广西壮族自治区, Tibet 西藏自治區|西藏自治区, Ningxia 寧夏回族自治區|宁夏回族自治区, Xinjiang 新疆維吾爾自治區|新疆维吾尔自治区
municipality, namely: Beijing 北京, Tianjin 天津, Shanghai 上海 and Chongqing 重慶|重庆, the first level administrative subdivision/province level city/also called directly governed city
prefecture/(old) province/(old) administrative division/state (e.g. of US)/oblast (Russia)/canton (Switzerland)
